name: Margherita Pizza
description: A classic pizza topped with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, fresh basil leaves, and a drizzle of olive oil.

name: Pepperoni Pizza
description: An all-time favorite topped with zesty tomato sauce, loads of pepperoni slices, and melted mozzarella cheese.

name: Vegetarian Pizza
description: A veggie lover's delight with a colorful array of fresh vegetables, including bell peppers, onions, mushrooms, olives, and more, all atop a crispy crust.

name: Supreme Pizza
description: A hearty pizza loaded with a variety of toppings, such as pepperoni, sausage, bell peppers, onions, olives, and mushrooms.

name: BBQ Chicken Pizza
description: A mouthwatering combination of tender chicken pieces, tangy barbecue sauce, red onions, cilantro, and melted mozzarella cheese.

name: Hawaiian Pizza
description: A tropical twist on a classic pizza, featuring ham, pineapple chunks, and melted mozzarella cheese.
